channel.title: Sum Circles
channel.description: Hey guys. Im sorry, i dont like to ask stupid questions but i really cbf today. I am asked to make a sum circle with 7 numbers in the box as primes, the numbers must be 1, 2, 3 ... 10 i have come up with the below circle [img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/9236/12df4.png[/img] I am told that there is only one possible way to make this but it also asks for a reason as to why there is only one, if i could get a quick reply it would be much appreciated. Thanks

item.title: Sum Circles

Switch the 5 and the 7.
